ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" SONY Effio CCD imager, Color DSP. NTSC system
700 TV lines high resolution. 0 lux with IR LEDs on
Build-in 4-9mm Varifocal lens. Build-in 42 Infrared LEDs for night vision
Weatherproof housing. Water, dust and crush resistant glass coating. IP66
Package included: 1 x SONY Effio camera, 1 x power supply, 1 x mini preamp microphone, 1 x audio video power extension cable and 1 x free security warning decal 3"x2"
